text: Tom Petty, known for hits such as ` ` Free Fallin ','' ` ` American Girl'' and ` ` Into the Great Wide Open,'' died Monday. He was 66. Petty sold over 80 million records during his decades in the music business. ( Published Tuesday, Oct. 3, 2017 ) Miley Cyrus honored Tom Petty's legacy on'The Tonight Show'Thursday. Petty died Monday after going into cardiac arrest. The singer - songwriter was 66 years old. As Cyrus said on ` ` The Howard Stern Show'' Wednesday, ` ` It's just really hard for me, watching those people that I grew up with leaving.''
